lead_paragraph: The 25-year-old welterweight boxer Oscar Diaz remained in critical but stable condition in a San Antonio hospital, but a doctor who performed brain surgery on him said that he expected Diaz to survive. Dr. David Jimenez said that Diaz was still in a coma, which was to be expected because of the severe brain injury. Diaz collapsed before the 11th round of a fight against Delvin Rodriguez on Wednesday night.
